Playlists¶

Playlist objects represent an ordered list of episodes. Once created, a Playlist can be saved as an M3U file, which is playable by most audio media players.

The M3U generated will be a list of links to the individual episodes. Therefore, playing the M3U will require the audo player to have Internet access.

class podfeed.playlists.Playlist¶

Represents a playlist of podcast episodes

addEpisode(episode)¶

Add an episode to this playlist

addEpisodes(episodes)¶

Add a set of episodes to this playlist

saveAsM3U(path)¶

Save this playlist to the file specified
